/** * A {@link org.apache.crunch.Target} that wraps {@link org.apache.crunch.types.avro.AvroPathPerKeyOutputFormat} to allow one file * per key to be written as the output of a {@code PTable}. * *

Note the restrictions that apply to the {@code AvroPathPerKeyOutputFormat}; in particular, it's a good
